title: Electric potential difference due to charge at ori

content.question: An isolated particle with a charge of <math alttext="positive 2 nanocoulombs" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>nC</mtext></mrow></math> is positioned at the origin of an <math alttext="x y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-coordinate system. The potential difference in going from point <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> at position <math alttext="2 meters, comma 6 meters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>m</mtext><mo>,</mo><mn>6</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>m</mtext><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> to point <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>B</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> at position <math alttext="negative 3 meters, comma 12 meters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>m</mtext><mo>,</mo><mn>12</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>m</mtext><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> is most nearly

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
